description: Transport network delays worsen, causing significant inconvenience and increasing public frustration.
Unidentified foreign entities exploit overlooked infrastructure weaknesses, initiating a cyberattack that increases tensions.
Cyberattack disrupts the city's transport systems, causing widespread confusion and gridlock.
Public protests begin at major transport hubs, demanding government accountability and detailed explanations of the disruptions.
The Council traces the cyberattack back to foreign influences, sparking heightened security alerts and delicate diplomatic negotiations.
The Council holds a press briefing acknowledging the cyberattack without revealing specific details, fueling public uncertainty.
Large-scale demonstrations erupt across the city, with citizens demanding transparency and improvements in security from the government.
